title: i drew hungry poro pls giv ritos point

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: pls, is only 74 rp left for pool party leona, for i drew poro on chemistry paper

replies.body: That poor, adorable poro is being attacked by Math!  Hopefully those snax will recharge him for his studies!  Stay in school, poro friend!  Hopefully some goodies were correctly added to your account, thanks for the drawing! xD
Attacked by..math? But math is friendly! Without it, there would be no way to know how many goodies were added to his/her account!
